Articles.Content:
I shove you down from the hill.

My hill.

I fling you up and off of the hill.

Meh hyllz.

I call a grammar naz! to check your spelling. You got killed by him.

Mein HÃƒÂ¼gel.

I stop supplying the grammar reich so it collapses.

Min kulle.

banned for relocating stomach un/self torture in a 1980nobel

My 1980nobel

The nobel prize goes to... Spiders Georg!

My Spiders Georg's cave.

Creepers spawn in an unlit sector of your cave and detonate in your lobby.

My Crater

I fill the crater with water and start a water park empire.

My monopoly on water slides.

I build a little pile of dirt and claim it.

My hill.

I walk on your hill and build a Nuclear Power Plant.

My Environmentell disaster

I am Sheldon Cooper. You're in my spot.

My Spot

I bring in Amy to distract you.

My spot.

ROOMMATE AGREEMENT SECTION 19, ARTICLE 21, ADDENDUM F! The far-left side of the couch, or the side closest to the window, is to be for SHELDON COOPER. Anyone else caught sitting in the spot shall be given one extra strike.

My spot. My beautiful, beautiful spot.

When in doubt, ADVANCE THE PAWNS!!!

(No wait that's chess...)

NUKE IT FROM ORBIT!!!

[bOOM]

Nobody's spot. It is gone.

I claim a nearby hill.

My hill.

I push a bigger hill over yours, you are crushed.

My hill.

I build a small lemonade stand next to the big hill, thinking it will attract people. Business starts to go slow so naturally i burn you hill down with the lemons I have left.

My flaming hill.

Hire a fire fighting helicopter. replace water with sulfuric acid. Hill replaced with sisseling crater.

Hire another one. replace water with dirt. New hill

My hill

Point out the fact that helicopters cannot carry sufficient quantities of dirt or sulfuric acid. The dirt magically fwoops down, the helicopter bursts into flames and explodes (along with you) ironically, and out of the lake of sulfuric acid emerges a hill that's on fire.

I use a fire fighting ram. The ram breathes on the fire and puts it out.

My hill & enslaved/pet ram.

I euthanize the ram, then launch a nuclear bomb at the hill. But those who survive, do so in great underground Vaults.

My vault.

I'm Handsome Jack.

My vault.

I'm the Lone Wanderer. You're in the wrong Vault, Jack. My sheer epicness alone ejects you from this continuity and into a slightly different one.

BAZING!

My Vault.

I ride a pet Legolas to your vault (and straight through stone). He fires an arrow at you, you know the rest.

My pet legolas and isolated region of underground.

I use the ONE RING TO RULE THEM ALL!!!!! to sneakily assassinate Legolas. I then replace him with his Power Rangers stunt double, Andross, who flys the Astro Megaship straight into the Vault.

My Megaship.

The ring slowly drives you mad and turns you into a ringwraith. When the ring falls off your finger, I pick it up.

My precious.

I take the ring and throw it into lava, with you still atached.

MAH HILL
